name: Time's Up (badulion)
description:
Enemies outnumber you, but you have one ace up one's sleeve.
Use your focus to slow down time and outsmart your opponents. Plan your actions carefully, you only have limited time fuel!

Use your default longbow with unlimited arrows or pick up a powerful laser from fallen foes.

Controls:

[LMB] - shoot

[W] - jump

[A] - move left

[D] - move right

[Space] - pause time

[ESC] - main menu

This is a prototype. Only one level is available at the moment.
